name: 通訊系統電腦模擬
goals: Understanding the random-access mechanism used in a Wi-Fi system.
The performance analysis for a Wi-Fi system and the simulation.
syllabus:
Introduction (Week 1)

Simulink (Week 2)

Simulink for solving a differential equation (Week 3)

Simulink for logic programming (Week 4)

Simulink for signal combination (Week 5)

Signal space representation (Week 6)

Simulink for QPSK (Week 7)

Midterm (Week 8)

MATLAB fundamentals (Week 9)

CSMA & CSMA/CD (Week 10)

Wi-Fi & CSMA/CA (Week 11)

IEEE 802.11 DCF (Week 12)

2-D Markov chain (Week 13)

Performance analysis (Week 14)

MATLAB simulation (Week 15)

Final exam (Week 16)

\*M/M/1 queueing model (Week 17)

\*M/M/1 MATLAB simulation (Week 18)
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
